short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show pinned folders and recent bookmarks on new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple list of the most recent bookmarks, along with the ability to search for a bookmark folder and pin it. Pinned folders can display their bookmarks in the descending chronological order as well by toggling a setting.

https://github.com/Zren/NewTabRecentBookmarks
